validityText:
The input provided is a paragraph of text. According to the input specification, the paragraph must contain at least three sentences. In this case, the paragraph does contain three sentences: "Dancing is a form of celebration.", "It connects people through movement and rhythm.", and "Cultures all over the world have unique dance styles.". Thus, the criterion of having at least three sentences is met.

Additionally, the specification mentions that the paragraph can include words or phrases that can be emphasized using <strong> and <em> tags, but this is not a mandatory requirement. The input does not emphasize any words or phrases, however, since this is not a required condition, it does not affect compliance.

Therefore, this paragraph complies with all the given requirements in the input specification.

OK
